title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-1.6 - Supervision and evaluation by the commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-1.6 - Supervision and evaluation by the commissioner

State Regulations
(a) All programs funded from the setaside for
compensatory education pursuant to paragraph g of subdivision 12 of section
3602
of the

Education Law shall be subject to the general supervision of the commissioner, who shall have the right to inspect the facilities and operation of such
programs and audit the records thereof at any time. (b) Appropriate individual records of each
pupil with compensatory educational needs shall be kept in the school. Records
of the operation of each program shall be kept by each school district and
submitted whenever required by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
149-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
